dc:title: Day After Day - June 1942
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Expresses a joyful heart in the midst of war preparations. Visits friends, Bishops, and West Coast Houses of Hospitality in Seattle and Los Angelus.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 217 1942-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
